<# .Synopsis Force Install Updates on Remote Computer .DESCRIPTION Force Install Updates on Remote Computer using a scheduled task .EXAMPLE InstallUpdates -Computer "server1.contoso.com" -User "Contoso\Administrator" -Password "Password" .NOTES Version 1.0 - Initial Script Written by Darryl van der Peijl Date: 30.05.2014
Use at own risk #>
Function InstallUpdates { param($Computer,$User,$Password)
$SecurePassword = ConvertTo-SecureString –String $Password –AsPlainText -Force $Credential = New-Object –TypeName System.Management.Automation.PSCredential –ArgumentList $User, $SecurePassword
...
